css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-c95fcac4-u{min-width:100%;box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-8,9,60,88),1);padding-top:150px;padding-bottom:20px;flex-direction:column;row-gap:40px;}body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-c95fcac4-u > .maxi-background-displayer .maxi-background-displayer__1{width:100%;height:100%;background-color:rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-1,0,0,0),1);display:block;}body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-c95fcac4-u > .maxi-background-displayer .maxi-background-displayer__2{width:300px;top:100px;left:5%;display:block;filter: blur(70px);}body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-c95fcac4-u > .maxi-background-displayer .maxi-background-displayer__2 svg *{fill:rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-4,255,74,23),0.2);}@media only screen and (min-width:1921px){body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-c95fcac4-u{row-gap:56px;}body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-c95fcac4-u > .maxi-background-displayer .maxi-background-displayer__2{width:500px;top:150px;left:10%;}}@media only screen and (max-width:1366px){body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-c95fcac4-u > .maxi-background-displayer .maxi-background-displayer__2{left:0%;}}@media only screen and (max-width:1024px){body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-c95fcac4-u > .maxi-background-displayer .maxi-background-displayer__2{width:200px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:480px){body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-c95fcac4-u{row-gap:30px;}}
